function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for disease transmission in crowded spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, ventilation systems, and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air purification systems, occupancy tracking technology, touchless fixtures","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and service staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Complex mathematical modeling without real-world validation","Impact":"Inaccurate or impractical solutions for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Conduct real-world testing and validation of proposed mathematical models","Technologies":"Simulation software, data collection sensors, statistical analysis tools","People":"Mathematicians, architects, engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, design firms"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for computational efficiency in design methodology","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing and maintaining the proposed design solutions","Mitigation":"Use computational optimization techniques, prioritize user-friendly interfaces","Technologies":"Computer-aided design (CAD), optimization algorithms, user interface design tools","People":"Designers, architects, facility managers","Owner":"Design firms, technology companies"}]}
